meanings.definition: One who tells again or recounts a story.
meanings.sent1: The reteller shared the same story with us multiple times.
meanings.sent2: The reteller at the library captivated the children with her storytelling.
meanings.sent3: The reteller kept repeating the story, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She was a reteller of old tales, breathing life into each word she spoke.
meanings.sent5: The reteller's voice echoed through the room, painting vivid images in our minds.

meanings.definition: A person who narrates or recounts a tale.
meanings.sent1: As a reteller, he brought new life to the ancient stories.
meanings.sent2: The reteller at the campfire had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent3: The reteller added a funny twist to the end of the story, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the best reteller in the village, her words like magic.
meanings.sent5: The reteller's animated gestures made the story unforgettable to all who listened.
